website_summaries.verdict: A spacious cart that's suitable for use around the kitchen or dining room.
pros: Attractive metal frame is topped with distressed wood for rustic appeal
Three roomy tiers include metal baskets for keeping small items organized
cons: Hardware tends to come loose, requiring tightening for stability

customer_reviews.title: Love the look. Not the design of putting the baskets together
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately, I love this cart. Pros: Its nice and long and wide, its super cute, and looks great with my décor. It was very easy to put together for the most part and quick. Cons: The wood isn't exactly the color I expected, the baskets are horrible to put together (the black stripped off the pins when sliding into place), the instructions were basically one picture of it put together leaving you to guess how to get to that point, and the price dropped $50 the day after I bought it. Even with so many cons I am happy with my purchase. All the cons have to do with putting it together, but once together, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: KatelynTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the wheels won’t turn properly. What’s the point of a cart if you still have to lift it to move it around. You get what you pay for. I purchased this for $166. I wouldn’t recommend paying more for this product. So be sure to wait for the price to drop. Overall I did like the look of it, it was also easy to put together, but you may need help. I covered he top with marble contact paper and it looked great for my party.
customer_reviews.author: Beccreative

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cart but poor construction. Used it for only two months and the connections were loose. When we tightened the screw stripped and now it's useless. Do not buy if you plan to put anything on it or wheel it around. I wish I had read the reviews and spent a little more for a better cart.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: A little shorter than I expected- I was hoping that it would match the height of my countertops with the casters on, but it's still a couple inches shorter. It looks like a very high quality, sturdy product. The baskets were the hardest part to assemble: it was very difficult to get the pins into the holes to hold them together, and two of them look a little bit crooked. Overall, it is exactly what I needed for kitchen storage and a small prep area!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. It was easy to assemble by myself. I enjoyed putting it together and enjoyed the results even more. The baskets were super easy to assemble and look great. Using it as a coffee station and couldn’t be happier. I bought a couple of skinny baskets to match. I will eventually get some decor added. (Be careful when putting the wheels on. I just assumed there wasn’t a difference when throwing them on at the end. Should have read the directions :))
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in a box that looked beat up. I was afraid that it might be dented or pieces may have fallen out of the box. Thank goodness neither fear was true. For what I paid for this piece of furniture it is surprisingly good quality. It’s took very little time to put it together and once it was put together it is very sturdy. I’m really happy I made this purchase. We are using it as a cart for our printer and office supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Jackijack

customer_reviews.title: Really cute cart!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cart! My husband had no issues putting it together. It initially came in damaged the first time. Obviously the people packing it need a better way to pack it. The seller was, amazingly, very easy to work with in getting my replacement coming and picking up the damaged one. The second one was packed the same, and had a small bit of damage on one of the shelves, but we were able to put it on the bottom and in the back, so you can't see it at all. Overall, I'm very pleased with the color and construction, and it looks great in my dining room with my coffee stuff on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: First the cart is very nice looking once assembled but I've had the same issues ...
customer_reviews.text: First the cart is very nice looking once assembled but I've had the same issues that some of the other reviewers have. 1) Shipping box was damaged with holes in it 2) One of the screws for the top shelf won't go in. It's like the hole that was drilled was not wide enough 3) After assembling it and putting the wheels on it we tried to move it on a carpeted floor and it started to come apart. Because we are using it as a shelving unit and won't be moving it I can say it's OK but otherwise it would only get 2 stars. It does look nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Levy

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome in person
customer_reviews.text: This came out to be so much better than I expected. I love the way it looks. It goes wonderfully in my industrial farmhouse style home. We have it as a coffee bar in our kitchen. My only reason for not giving five stars is that it is very easy to scratch the "wood" surface shelves with the included baskets. I have 2 boys and unfortunately learned this immediately after putting it together. All in all though, definitely a great deal for the price, and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: LilacDreams

customer_reviews.title: Free up some counter space...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I was looking for a microwave cart because my kitchen is small and the microwave took up too much counter space. This cart worked great and also homes my coffee maker and coffee cups. The wheel caster is probably the only con. I don't think its meant to be pushed around alot. It also leaves black marks on your floor. Mine stays stationary. I like the industrial look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy T

customer_reviews.title: Great for small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's college apartment. It really added a lot of storage and cooking prep. It looks amazing. It is sturdy and stylish. She gets a lot of compliments on it. A must have if your kitchen is small.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Lerma III

customer_reviews.title: Metal is not plain black
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Seems mostly stable, though I haven't used it for it's intended purpose yet. Difficult to control when pushing it forward, but that's expected with any cart of this nature. The wheels are absolutely too small, but I'll replace those later with more heavy duty wheels. What's not clear when you're ordering (and what was a surprise to me) is that the metal has red specks throughout. While not a deal breaker for me, it could certainly be somewhat of a deterrent to others.
customer_reviews.author: Adverum

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cart. I purchased it “open box/slight imperfection” for $119. I can’t tell any imperfection in the wood at all. The cart is an amazing size and value for the money. Wheels are wobbly but I’m not driving it around. 2/3 of the baskets didn’t latch fully due to poor workmanship of the wire; but baskets are expensive and these were included in the price. the black hardware is not completely opaque black which you can’t even tell when it’s built and set up. Breaking down the boxes and cleaning up took longer than assembly! Quick and easy. I would buy another if I had room
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall the end product looks nice after it's assembled especially for the price. However I don’t think the quality is that great. The packaging was half open on arrival. Instructions is 1 single page. The wood had some minor damages. I would be happy if this last for a few years. So yea that’s why it’s only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Clarie

customer_reviews.title: I’m screwed, the cart isn’t
customer_reviews.text: I was really exacted because we purchase one in the past and it came in the terrible beaten box with it half open but we ended up loving the cart. Bought another one and started to count all the part but ZERO screws. How the hell?! While immediately trying to constancy them I realized 2 things... no phone number and a non working support web page.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This piece absolutely went above and beyond my expectations. I expected it to be smallish and kinda flimsy, something to hold a few drinks and be the right color scheme. But it’s actually such nice quality, larger than expected, and I love the baskets underneath. Very very happy with the quality, especially for what we paid (which I feel was not much for the size and look of this cart).
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Product feels like good quality. Took my son and I about 30-45 mins to put together. Produced a ton of garbage though. The only thing I don’t like is that there are two wheels that are hard to move. This was intentional on the designers part but I don’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: janebell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This cart was very easy to assemble. Appears well made and is sturdy. Small thing but one of the wire baskets were slightly misshapen. We actually use large cloth bins on the bottom shelf and use the wire baskets it came with on the smaller shelf. They fit if you get them past the bar underneath the top shelf. It's a tight squeeze and I worry about scraping over time but for now seems fine. Love the look of this shelf and a great size!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: It is nice, not easy to put together as most of the pieces were not labeled, but not that hard. Two people would be helpful. Just so you know, if you are going to put it to hard use the wooden shelves may need something over them so they don't get scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Beckie

customer_reviews.title: Prtoduct looked good and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart to use in my dinning area. Hubby was gone so I assembled it myself. everything was there except I'm missing one of the clips for the baskets; would love to know how to get the clip, otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Good bar cart, really great appearance and very nice size. Not super sturdy - but ok. Ordered the console table to match, liked this car that much. Overall great purchase for the price. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Girl

customer_reviews.title: For limited counter space.
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like the pictures except the wood is less interesting in person. And like others said, its not the sturdiest. I mean it will hold anything, but when pushed it will sway left to right. The baskets were SOOOOO HARD to put together. And one of them just doesn't line up so I can't use it. But its the perfect size to fit extra kitchen items if you are limited on counter space.
customer_reviews.author: The Daily Dose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This cart is beautiful and works well as a coffee station in my kitchen. However, neither the baskets or the cart are not very sturdy, and I think the price is about $50 too high. But I love the look of it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather F

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Wow this was so easy to put together. It seems very sturdy and looks great. The only down side is that the clips for the baskets were just laying in there haphazardly and I lost one. So that is why I only have two baskets in the picture. Basically I threw the box away before I realized it but it would have been more helpful if they had been with the rest of the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Waits

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great addition to the living room
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cart. We wanted something to go behind our couch but also be able to roll into the kitchen if more prep space was needed. Surprised at the durability and weight of the shelves. Not lightweight and not cheap! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kbiggs

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: This box was heavy lol but very easy to assemble. I did it alone but it would be much easier with two people because it’s hard to secure the screws with one hand and hold up the wood with your other hand. However, very simple to put together and a beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: I guess they fixed the problems the other buyers must have had. Was a breeze setting up, no trouble with the baskets, and man does it like nice! Much higher quality than I anticipated. My plan is to use it as a coffee station, but now seeing how nice it looks, I need to get a silicon pad first so I don’t ruin the wood with water and coffee stains. Looks amazing and is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t measure before I bought this, so when I did, I was very nervous it was going to be too short. Nope! Once assembled (very simple to do) it is the same height as my kitchen table. Very pretty and good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great but hard to move around
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bar cart, but when it arrived the hardware was not included. Who sends something that needs to be assembled with out the bolts needed to assemble? I had to make a Home Depot run just so I could put it together. I had many compliments on it at our Holiday Party and it makes a nice addition to our dining room. The only other issue I have is that it is not easy to move even with the wheels...they do not turn easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, but not super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and functions just fine as our coffee bar at home, but a little wobbly. It should really have a brace or two that go diagonally across the back if it's ever going to be 100% stable. Still, it works for what we needed. If you're looking to have something you can actually wheel around a lot, I wouldn't buy this as it probably won't be sturdy enough. If you're just leaving it in one place, it's fine. (Wire baskets are a nice bonus, but also not sturdy if you're planning to move them around.)
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Come With Assembly Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so for $150, I got a cart. It seems to be a good solid piece of furniture, but I'll warn ya... if you haven't spent many a Christmas putting together gifts for your kids, or bought copious amounts of Ikea furniture and struggled with depression and drinking while assembling, you may need to re-think your purchase. There are NO instructions for putting this cart together. My only words of wisdom... PUT THE TOP ON FIRST.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMum

customer_reviews.title: Missing bolts / screws
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice cart However I can’t put it together it DIDNT come with the screws/ bolts or small tools as indicated in the diagram. Here's an update at first I was missing parts but I contacted the company directly and they are expediting the missing parts! Looks like it will be a great purchase after all. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pots and appliances
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely what I needed for my pots and appliances. I have so much more counter space now that I can store items on this rack. It’s very modern and even with exposed items it doesn’t make my kitchen seem cluttered
customer_reviews.author: Holly B.

customer_reviews.title: It's nice.. but its a bit pricey for what ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice .. but its a bit pricey for what you get. The wheels do not move that well. I have wood floors so it should move pretty easily but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Will add larger casters to use in kitchen as an island... currently sits about 5-6" lower than existing countertops. Went together quickly and easily with one person. Would be easier with two, but not impossible to do alone. After putting everything together, don't forget to go back and re-tighten everything!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great storage as well as beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a coffee bar and it looks amazing! It has a great deal of space for storage, but the crates that come with it are not so great. They are metal, which scratches the wood and they are not sturdy. They do offer a lot of space though. All and all I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.O.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: About what you might expect for cheap Chinese manufacture. Box arrived damaged and styro breaking apart into thousands of pieces, which wouldn't have bothered me aside from the missing hardware which I now how to go find and hope fits the die cut holes. I would not recommend this piece.
customer_reviews.author: philip N.

customer_reviews.title: Read down on the reviews before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box was in horrible condition on top of that there were parts missing the essentials like the screws the instructions two of the boards had damages on the corner pieces wheels are too small they drag that about sums it up. I wish I would have scrolled lower on the reviews of the product to see what others had to say before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: igor v. kudas

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and really helps organize your home. And I was super happy to see how easy it was to assemble! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Armando Segura

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged! Beware do not buy. Two of ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged ! Beware do not buy. Two of the “wood” shelf’s came in with huge chunks missing. One more than the other. Hardware was missing. Paid over $250 for damaged non wood product sending this item back will be a challenge. Item is now on sale for $151 to as insult to injury
customer_reviews.author: angela rhedrick

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s pictured
customer_reviews.text: This was not what was pictured.. the wood was a thick grain pattern and the black was not sprayed thoroughly. I would not recommend this purchase at all.. it unfortunately became a dyi project that I didn’t sign up for..
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, very functional
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bar cart. Very sturdy. Fairly easy to put together. The best part is it solved the question of what to do with all of my liquor that was taking up wayyy too much space on a counter. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice, but it's really difficult to tighten the screws so it's a little wobbly. One of the corners was also damaged
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look of this
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this... exactly what I wanted. I have to admit I didn't put it together myself but I was told it wasn't difficult. The wood shelves are very sturdy and the wheels work; even though I don't plan on moving it around.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Rust

customer_reviews.title: Great size, sturdy, and storage galore!
customer_reviews.text: Great cart. Plenty of room for bottles, glasses, and accessories. Pretty sturdy, 4/5. Very easy to put together, less than 30 mins. Baskets offer a stylish place to store unopened bottles and mixers. Larger than most which I really like. Great Industrial design but not over the top; subtle but still fashionable. A must for any millennial!
customer_reviews.author: CFitz

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I started putting it together by myself and probably could have completely with a little struggle, just because I had it upside down and not on it’s side. But it was super easy to put together. One of my baskets was a little difficult to put together but my husband used plyers to help bend it to fit but it was an easy fix!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C.

customer_reviews.title: Needs 2 people to assemble but very easy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! Perfect for filling up an empty space i had in my kitchen. I am currently using it as a mini coffee bar, but will be using the bottom shelves for serving /dishes if i have company over. This was really easy to assemble and took about 20 minutes! It is sturdy and convenient to move around with the small wheels on the bottom of the legs. This is definitely a piece that can be used for more than one purpose and easily changeable to fit your needs. Would highly recommend this product for its price, you get a lot out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I Love it very easy to assemble great Materials loved the boxes was very easy to assemble as well👌
customer_reviews.author: Amy shedid

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately arrived damaged; a major hassle when something is so big.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Only reason I'm keeping it is because Amazon offered me a nice discount. Once its assembled and stuff is put ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received my "cart." Lets put it this way, the wheels don't work so its much of a cart, the top piece of wood is broken and lifted in one corner as if someone dropped it. Which I'm not that surprised because the packaging was delivered destroyed. Only reason I'm keeping it is because Amazon offered me a nice discount. Once its assembled and stuff is put on it, it looks nice. But the fact that it isn't much of a cart, and it came destroyed, 2 stars is all it deserves.
customer_reviews.author: eyal nevo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, attractive and is perfect in my kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: JoEllen Dowler

customer_reviews.title: just got it that it was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Just received the movable island the box was tore up the handles are scratched but I got it completely disappointed in how to ride and the fact that it was damaged
customer_reviews.author: Angela Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love this cart
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to put together and looks great! Perfect size. But it is hard to move around. The wheels are not the best and hard to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble rustic cart
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great! Could be sturdier but I don't move the cart, like ever, so it suits my purpose. Could be a little taller too (I'm 5'2"). The weathered wood looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DJjHazey

customer_reviews.title: no wheels) I tried to buy hardware (screws) and did the best I could
customer_reviews.text: The product came with no hardware (no screws, no wheels) I tried to buy hardware (screws) and did the best I could, it is put together with no wheels which is a problem
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my daughter! Thoroughly loved it. Easy to put together . She uses it at the end of the kitchen counter as Coffee-Tea Bar!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sanders

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice but I have no way of putting it together
customer_reviews.text: When I received my package the box was damaged, it came with the wrong instruction paper and it came with ZERO scews to put the pieces together. It looks nice but I have no way of putting it together. Which is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Gapen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Took less than 40 mins to assemble by myself. Sturdy enough for moderate use. Not wobbly at all. Directions were minimal, but easy to figure out. I laid it on its side to attach shelves and casters. Not solid wood, but looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little cart, it was super easy to assemble only 12 screws and you cannot mess it up took me five minutes. The clips for the basket were scattered around the box but other than that it’s nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It would be perfect if the wood looked more natural.
customer_reviews.author: Irelandbeach

customer_reviews.title: Classy, Sturdy, Good Quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cart. Used in my house and now currently using in my office. I get many compliments on it. Sturdy and made well. Durable and classy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Busby

customer_reviews.title: Unstable cart
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart using in the kitchen as a microwave cart and the store some dishes but I can't get it to be stable. I've tighten up the screws but is still shaky
customer_reviews.author: CarolynO.

customer_reviews.title: Great accent piece!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason it’s not 5 stars is that I’d have preferred adjustable shelf heights.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bar and has a really nice look. It came as pictured and looks very nice in our home. Our friends have all given compliments. It was very easy to put together. If you are looking to use it stationary it is good but we found it doesn't roll very well which is fine for me since we only keep it in one area.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the way this cart fits in my kitchen. It looks great and is extremely easy to assemble. I would recommend this kitchen cart to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: A nice cart and exactly what I was looking for. It was very easy to assemble. I was using a smaller cart and a box for storage. With this cart able to store everything in one place and it looks good in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect kitchen cart!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use for the coffee bar I want in my new home. It arrived yesterday and it’s perfect! It looks great. Wasn’t hard to put together at all. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Renee M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture! I’m using it as a coffee bar and it’s holding extra platters and dishes. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It works great in my kitchen as pantry storage and prep station, the baskets hold way more then they look like they will and the wood top is just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: It looks better in person.
customer_reviews.text: It is well made, versatile, and looks great. I made it into a coffee/wine/whiskey bar.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but not useful as designed
customer_reviews.text: The stand is sturdy and attractive, it just is not able to move. Wheels are very small and do not pivot. When we want to move the cart, we have to pick it up which defeats the purpose of the mobility. Study other products if mobility of the cart is important.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G Bice

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. I used to use it as a set up for all of my coffee gear. Now that I have a baby, we use it for her toys and other things!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha L.

customer_reviews.title: Look for actual contact information,  not just a manufacturer name with blank contact information.
customer_reviews.text: Very upset hardware was not included. Not taped to packaging, or the styrofoam or the product. Did receive the wheels. No contact to complain too or ask for hardware. Frustrated. Too big to ship back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous addition to my home
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome, made myself a little coffee bar out of this, looks just as it does in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn Benning

customer_reviews.title: Makes For A Cute Coffee Bar!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my new kitchen cart! Sturdy, lots of space for storage, and super duper cute! Was easy to put together as well. Do not hesitate to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kayani

customer_reviews.title: While the wheels were no good, replacing them with a hardware buy was very ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I was looking for a low cost yet durable piece. While the wheels were no good, replacing them with a hardware buy was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: amazonamante

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful coffee cart! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace the first item because the parts were warped and defective. The replaced item is missing wheels. Product support is unavailable. My hope is that someone will see this comment and help resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this best value for the money! We use it as a kitchen island! Totally worth it! I use it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was very simple to assemble (I did it by myself, though it would have been easier with a second person). Great quality. I store cookbooks on it in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kansastransplant

customer_reviews.title: Shipping may damage!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with dent in handle. Not large enough to return, but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Steward Property

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful piece for us. Cleared up counter space and is very well built. I do recommend this piece
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Clary

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING !
customer_reviews.text: I AM SUPER HAPPY !!!! I live in Saudi and guess what !!! I got it today and just combined the table can’t wait to take a photo for it : ) i’d give you 10000000 stars and recommend ♥️♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.author: najd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the overall quality. It looks and feels very nice and well made. However, I am missing most of the hardware and therefore cannot assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Hillegeist

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this bar cart
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this bar cart. We assembled it in 30 minutes. It doesn't really roll but I'm okay with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kate F

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the office lobby for our clients' beverage console. It is perfect & very sturdy & well made. The wire baskets are included!! Fantastic & would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Product came in damage and can’t get a hold of anyone to replace the parts. Missing two wired baskets and top shelf scratchers and broken on the corners. So upset!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together & looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised. Easy to put together & looks nice. Very sturdy once assembled. Was the start to my coffe bar!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself is very nice. My package was missing one of the pins used to assemble the baskets for the bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Bar
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous bar! I am so pleased how it looks. It was easy to assemble, and feels very sturdy. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: Received it and had to move a couple days later. Return was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product came damaged. It is too much of a hassle with kids and jobs to get everything re boxed and returned in order to get money back so this will just be a loss in our book.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: This island was easily assembled and looks good. One of the screw heads was already stripped out when it arrived so I had to improvise that one piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth what I paid for it! Reinforced and was easy to put together! Even came with the tools.
customer_reviews.text: Product was much more well put together and heavier material than I was even expecting! Well worth what I paid for it! Reinforced and was easy to put together! Even came with the tools.
customer_reviews.author: wendy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Dont  move it
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 months the wheels fell off because the screws on the castors completely stripped and have nothing to hold on to. looks fine as long as you don't plan on moving it.
customer_reviews.author: amy l

customer_reviews.title: Rustic and chic
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cart. It sits in my dining room and matches my table and decor perfectly. Was easy to put together. Lots of storage and was a good price. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product, put the entire thing together before realizing one of the metal sides was welded poorly causing the threads for the wheels to be inaccessible.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Billson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart! Very easy to put together and looks nice and expensive! We made our into a coffee bar and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect breakfast area addition!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect addition to my breakfast area. It is great for making more organizational space in my kitchen cabinets and on my kitchen counters. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shirrie

customer_reviews.title: No screws for assembly
customer_reviews.text: NO SCREWS FOR ASSEMBLY PACKAGE PACKED POORLY OPEN ON THE PORCH AFTER DELIVERY
customer_reviews.author: PMP

product_meta.title: Baxton Studio Lancashire Wood and Metal Kitchen Cart, Brown
product_meta.description: Stark rustic styling plus generous surface space combine in our Lancashire Wood and Metal Kitchen Cart. This triple-decker table’s vintage industrial design is achieved via antique bronze metal finishing and distressed ash veneer. Metal wheels make this kitchen cart highly mobile. Sturdy construction ensures years of use. Superior styling at a discount-furniture price.
feature_bullets: Vintage industrial rustic design kitchen cart
Distressed wood top and shelf with ash veneer
Framed in durable rustic iron metal in bronze
Metal wheels provide the convenience of mobility

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars277 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
